blocks.name: iocunico
blocks.content: Split an open interval into two pieces at point B, Co-author TA. (Contributed by Jon Pennant, 8-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm iocunico(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))), wceq(cun(co(c0, cioc, c1), co(c1, cico, c2)), co(c0, cioo, c2)))
} = {
  3eqtr3a(cun(co(c0, cioc, c1), co(c1, cico, c2)), co(c0, cioo, c2), cun(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), csn(c1)), cun(csn(c1), co(c1, cioo, c2))), cun(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), csn(c1)), co(c1, cioo, c2)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))))
  3eqtrri(cun(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), csn(c1)), cun(csn(c1), co(c1, cioo, c2))), cun(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), csn(c1)), co(c1, cioo, c2)), cun(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c1, cioo, c2)), csn(c1)), cun(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), csn(c1)), cun(co(c1, cioo, c2), csn(c1))))
  un23(co(c0, cioo, c1), csn(c1), co(c1, cioo, c2))
  unundir(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c1, cioo, c2), csn(c1))
  uneq2i(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), csn(c1)), cun(co(c1, cioo, c2), csn(c1)), cun(csn(c1), co(c1, cioo, c2)))
  uncom(co(c1, cioo, c2), csn(c1))
  uneq12d(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), csn(c1)), cun(csn(c1), co(c1, cioo, c2)), co(c0, cioc, c1), co(c1, cico, c2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))))
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))), wceq(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), csn(c1)), co(c0, cioc, c1)), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2)))
  simprl(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  ioounsn(c0, c1)
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))), wceq(cun(csn(c1), co(c1, cioo, c2)), co(c1, cico, c2)), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2)))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2)))
  simprr(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  snunioo(c1, c2)
  ioojoin(c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: iocinico
blocks.content: The intersection of two sets that meet at a point is that point. (Contributed by Jon Pennant, 12-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm iocinico(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))), wceq(cin(co(c0, cioc, c1), co(c1, cico, c2)), csn(c1)))
} = {
  eqssd(cin(co(c0, cioc, c1), co(c1, cico, c2)), csn(c1), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))))
  sseqtrd(cin(co(c0, cioc, c1), co(c1, cico, c2)), csn(c1), co(c1, cicc, c1), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2)), wss(cin(co(c0, cioc, c1), co(c1, cico, c2)), co(c1, cicc, c1)))
  syl6sseq(cin(co(c0, cioc, c1), co(c1, cico, c2)), co(c1, cicc, c1), cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c1))), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)))
  syl5eqss(cin(co(c0, cioc, c1), co(c1, cico, c2)), cab(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c1))), cab(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cico, c2)))), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)))
  df-in(hs0, co(c0, cioc, c1), co(c1, cico, c2))
  ss2abdv(hs0, w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cico, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c1)))
  sylibrd(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cico, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c1)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)))
  syl6(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cico, c2))), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)))))
  anim12d(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioc, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cico, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0))))
  syl6bi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioc, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioc, c1)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))))
  elioc1(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  3simpb(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  syl6bi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cico, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0))), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c2)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cico, c2)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c2))))
  elico1(c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  3simpa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c2))
  3jca(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  simpll(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0))))
  simprr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)))
  simplr(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0))))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c1)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))))
  anidms(wcel(c1, cxr), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cicc, c1)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))))
  elicc1(c1, c1, cv(hs0))
  abid2(hs0, co(c1, cicc, c1))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2)), wceq(co(c1, cicc, c1), csn(c1)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wceq(co(c1, cicc, c1), csn(c1)))
  iccid(c1)
  snssd(c1, cin(co(c0, cioc, c1), co(c1, cico, c2)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))))
  elind(c1, co(c0, cioc, c1), co(c1, cico, c2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))))
  mpbir3and(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))), wcel(c1, co(c0, cioc, c1)), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c1))
  simprl(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2)), wb(wcel(c1, co(c0, cioc, c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c1))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wb(wcel(c1, co(c0, cioc, c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c1))))
  elioc1(c0, c1, c1)
  mpbir3and(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))), wcel(c1, co(c1, cico, c2)), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c1, cle, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  xrleidd(c1, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2)))
  simprr(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2)), wb(wcel(c1, co(c1, cico, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c1, cle, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wb(wcel(c1, co(c1, cico, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c1, cle, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))))
  elico1(c1, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cioc, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cico, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cicc, c1))
}

blocks.name: iocmbl
blocks.content: An open-below, closed-above real interval is measurable. (Contributed by Jon Pennant, 12-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm iocmbl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(co(c0, cioc, c1), cdm(cvol)))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(co(c0, cioc, c1), cdm(cvol)), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wcel(co(c0, cioc, c1), cdm(cvol)))
  eqeltrrd(co(c0, cioc, c1), cdm(cvol), cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), csn(c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  syl3an2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), csn(c1)), co(c0, cioc, c1)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  ioounsn(c0, c1)
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wcel(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), csn(c1)), cdm(cvol)))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), csn(c1)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(co(c0, cioo, c1), cdm(cvol)), wcel(csn(c1), cdm(cvol)))
  ioombl(c0, c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(csn(c1), cdm(cvol)))
  eqeltrrd(csn(c1), cdm(cvol), co(c1, cicc, c1), wcel(c1, cr))
  syl(wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(c1, cicc, c1), csn(c1)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  iccid(c1)
  anidms(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(co(c1, cicc, c1), cdm(cvol)))
  iccmbl(c1, c1)
  unmbl(co(c0, cioo, c1), csn(c1))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wcel(co(c0, cioc, c1), cdm(cvol)))
  syld3an3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wcel(co(c0, cioc, c1), cdm(cvol)), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  biimp3ar(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wb(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr))
  id(wcel(c0, cxr))
  xrlenlt(c1, c0)
  syl6eqel(co(c0, cioc, c1), cdm(cvol), emptycls, w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))
  syl3an2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wceq(co(c0, cioc, c1), emptycls), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rexr(c1)
  biimp3ar(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wceq(co(c0, cioc, c1), emptycls))
  ioc0(c0, c1)
  0mbl()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iocmbl(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ)→(c0[(,]]c1)∈ dom(vol))
} = {
  pm2.61dan((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ), (c0[(,]]c1)∈ dom(vol), c0[<]c1)
  3expa(c0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ, c0[<]c1, (c0[(,]]c1)∈ dom(vol))
  eqeltrrd((c0[(,]]c1), dom(vol), ((c0[(,)]c1)⋃ { c1 }), (c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0[<]c1))
  syl3an2(c0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ, c0[<]c1, ((c0[(,)]c1)⋃ { c1 })=(c0[(,]]c1), c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  ioounsn(c0, c1)
  3adant3(c0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ, c0[<]c1, ((c0[(,)]c1)⋃ { c1 })∈ dom(vol))
  sylancr((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ), ((c0[(,)]c1)⋃ { c1 })∈ dom(vol), (c0[(,)]c1)∈ dom(vol), { c1 } ∈ dom(vol))
  ioombl(c0, c1)
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ, { c1 } ∈ dom(vol))
  eqeltrrd({ c1 }, dom(vol), (c1[[,]]c1), c1 ∈ ℝ)
  syl(c1 ∈ ℝ, (c1[[,]]c1)= { c1 }, c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  iccid(c1)
  anidms(c1 ∈ ℝ, (c1[[,]]c1)∈ dom(vol))
  iccmbl(c1, c1)
  unmbl((c0[(,)]c1), { c1 })
  3expa(c0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ, ¬ c0[<]c1, (c0[(,]]c1)∈ dom(vol))
  syld3an3(c0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ, ¬ c0[<]c1, (c0[(,]]c1)∈ dom(vol), c1[≤]c0)
  biimp3ar(c0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ, ¬ c0[<]c1, c1[≤]c0)
  syl2anr(c0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ, (c1[≤]c0 ↔ ¬ c0[<]c1), c1 ∈ ℝ*, c0 ∈ ℝ*)
  id(c0 ∈ ℝ*)
  xrlenlt(c1, c0)
  syl6eqel((c0[(,]]c1), dom(vol), emptycls, (c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1[≤]c0))
  syl3an2(c0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ, c1[≤]c0, (c0[(,]]c1)= ∅, c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  rexr(c1)
  biimp3ar(c0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ*, c1[≤]c0, (c0[(,]]c1)= ∅)
  ioc0(c0, c1)
  0mbl()
}

blocks.name: cnioobibld
blocks.content: A bounded, continuous function on an open bounded interval is integrable. The function must be bounded. For a counterexample, consider ` F = ( x e. ( 0 (,) 1 ) |-> ( 1 / x ) ) ` . See ~ cniccibl for closed bounded intervals. (Contributed by Jon Pennant, 31-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnioobibld(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cibl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(co(c1, cioo, c2), ccncf, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(c0, cibl), wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0)))))
  sylancr(w0, wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(co(c1, cioo, c2), cdm(cvol)), wcel(c0, co(co(c1, cioo, c2), ccncf, cc)))
  ioombl(c1, c2)
  cnmbf(co(c1, cioo, c2), c0)
  eqeltrd(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr, cfv(cvol, co(c1, cioo, c2)), w0)
  fveq2d(cvol, cdm(c0), co(c1, cioo, c2), w0)

thm cnioobibld(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ L^1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈((c1[(,)]c2)[-cn->]ℂ))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(c0),(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤]s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  syl3anc(w0, c0 ∈ L^1, c0 ∈ MblFn, (vol ` dom(c0))∈ ℝ, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(c0),(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤]s0)))
  sylancr(w0, c0 ∈ MblFn, (c1[(,)]c2)∈ dom(vol), c0 ∈((c1[(,)]c2)[-cn->]ℂ))
  ioombl(c1, c2)
  cnmbf((c1[(,)]c2), c0)
  eqeltrd((vol ` dom(c0)), cr, (vol `(c1[(,)]c2)), w0)
  fveq2d(cvol, dom(c0), (c1[(,)]c2), w0)
  3syl(w0, dom(c0)=(c1[(,)]c2), c0 ∈((c1[(,)]c2)[-cn->]ℂ), (c0 :(c1[(,)]c2)→ ℂ))
  cncff(c0, (c1[(,)]c2), cc)
  fdm(c0, (c1[(,)]c2), cc)
  syl2anc(w0, (vol `(c1[(,)]c2))∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ioovolcl(c1, c2)
  bddibl(s0, s1, c0)
}

blocks.name: arearect
blocks.content: The area of a rectangle whose sides are parallel to the coordinate axes in ` ( RR X. RR ) ` is its width multiplied by its height. (Contributed by Jon Pennant, 19-Mar-2019.)

blocks.name: areaquad
blocks.content: The area of a quadrilateral with two sides which are parallel to the y-axis in ` ( RR X. RR ) ` is its width multiplied by the average height of its higher edge minus the average height of its lower edge. Co-author TA. (Contributed by Jon Pennant, 31-May-2019.)
